mapper.select: SELECT NUM, CONTENT, REGIST_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, STATUS, USER_NUM, PRODUCT_NUM FROM TBL_PRODUCT_REVIEW ORDER BY REGIST_DATE DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_PRODUCT_REVIEW SET CONTENT=#{content}, REGIST_DATE=SYSDATE, UPDATE_DATE=SYSDATE, USER_NUM=#{userNum}, PRODUCT_NUM=#{productNum} WHERE NUM=#{num};
